name: HorseaFi
description: A new crypto birthed by Explorer of the Ocean community. Simply explore, rescue, collect and hold as 2% from each transaction is automatically redistributed to HorseaFi holders. HorseaFi primary utility is building a explorer community to spread awareness of Oceans & animals. $HORSEA is a Ultra-deflationary token designed to become more scarce over time. All holders of HORSEA will earn more HORSEA + BUSD that is automatically sent to your wallet by simply holding HORSEA coins in your wallet. Watch the amount of HORSEA & BUSD in your wallet grow as HORSEA holders automatically receive a 2% fee from every chain transaction that happens on the HORSEA ecosystem. The community receives more HORSEA & BUSD coins from the fees generated each transaction. Our vision is to create an ecosystem where Holder’s can have fun trading and also be a part of our serious cause, that will reward the Holder’s in the form of Stable rewards and Virtual rewards, which will be provided by generated revenue from our utilities.
